title: Person Merged
description: Example illustrating the result of reading a person that has been merged.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gedcomx xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <person id="pid">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/ancestry?person=pid" rel="ancestry" title="Ancestry"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/changes" rel="change-history" title="Person Change History"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/child-relationships" rel="child-relationships" title="Parent-Child Relationships to Children"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/descendancy?person=pid" rel="descendancy" title="Descendancy"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/discussion-references" rel="discussion-references" title="Person Discussion References"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/fs-child-relationships" rel="fs-child-relationships" title="Child-and-Parents Relationships to Children"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/fs-parent-relationships" rel="fs-parent-relationships" title="Child-and-Parents Relationships to Parents"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/notes" rel="notes" title="Person Notes"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/parent-relationships" rel="parent-relationships" title="Parent-Child Relationships to Parents"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/matches" rel="person-matches" title="Person Matches"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons-with-relationships?person=pid" rel="person-with-relationships" title="Person With Relationships"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid" rel="person" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Person"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/source-references" rel="source-references" title="Person Source References"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/pid/spouse-relationships" rel="spouse-relationships" title="Person Relationships to Spouses"/>
        <attribution>
            <changeMessage>wikipedia knows</changeMessage>
        </attribution>
        <living>true</living>
        <gender type="http://gedcomx.org/Female"/>
        <name type="http://gedcomx.org/BirthName" id="name-id">
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345/conclusions/name-id" rel="conclusion" title="Person Conclusion"/>
            <attribution>
                <contributor resource="urn:name-attribution" resourceId="KNCV-RMZ"/>
            </attribution>
            <preferred>true</preferred>
            <nameForm>
                <fullText>Anastasia Aleksandrova</fullText>
                <part type="http://gedcomx.org/Given" value="Anastasia"/>
                <part type="http://gedcomx.org/Surname" value="Aleksandrova"/>
            </nameForm>
            <nameForm>
                <fullText>Анастасия Александрова</fullText>
                <part type="http://gedcomx.org/Given" value="Анастасия"/>
                <part type="http://gedcomx.org/Surname" value="Александрова"/>
            </nameForm>
        </name>
        <fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Birth" id="born">
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345/conclusions/born" rel="conclusion" title="Person Conclusion"/>
            <attribution>
                <contributor resource="urn:fact-attribution" resourceId="RMQW-LPK"/>
            </attribution>
            <date>
                <original>3 Apr 1836</original>
                <formal>+1836</formal>
            </date>
            <place>
                <original>Moscow, Russia</original>
            </place>
        </fact>
        <fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Adoption" id="adopted">
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345/conclusions/adopted" rel="conclusion" title="Person Conclusion"/>
            <attribution>
                <contributor resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/JNYR-KJP" resourceId="JNYR-KJP"/>
            </attribution>
            <date>
                <original>13 Apr 1836</original>
                <formal>+1836-04-13</formal>
            </date>
            <place description="#-1276974106">
                <original>Moscow, Russia</original>
            </place>
        </fact>
    </person>
    <place id="-1276974106">
        <name>Moskva, Moscow, Russia</name>
        <latitude>37.613983</latitude>
        <longitude>55.784296</longitude>
    </place>
</gedcomx>
